Alert.Text: You shall type a correct value

Number.Integer: You shall type an integer number between

Decimal.Beginning: You shall use point as decimal separator, with no spaces, and type a number between

Duration.Hours: The number of hours shall be between 0 and 99.
Duration.Minutes: The number of minutes shall be between 0 and 59.

Browsing.GenericBeginningText: Generic beginning page, can be overridden or removed by processing your own xslt on the result.
Browsing.GenericEndText: Generic end page, can be overridden or removed by processing your own xslt on the result.
Browsing.FatalError: There was a problem with saving/submitting your answers.
Browsing.GoBack: Go back to the last accessed page
Browsing.WelcomeBackText: You started filling the questionnaire. To continue, what do you wish to do ?
Browsing.WarningText:
Some fields of this page are marked as warnings.

Do you wish to correct those warnings before going on filling the questionnaire ?
Browsing.ErrorText:
Some fields of this page are marked as errors.

You need to correct those warnings before going on filling the questionnaire.
